participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Reserved yet thoughtful, Oliver has a deep appreciation for the simple joys in life and values meaningful connections.
participant_1.background: I have my family members in my heart, even if I've never met them. My inspiration is classical music. I do not talk a lot. I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs. I sometimes eat too much sugar, which can cause my blood sugar levels to spike.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and dedicated, Sophia finds fulfillment in her family and cherishes the sacrifices she has made for their happiness.
participant_2.background: I've had to make a lot of sacrifices for my family, but it's all been worth it. I eat mainly Chinese food. I love spending time with my family because they are always there for me. I do not have a college degree. I keep a healthy weight for my age.

content.text: What's up? I'm walking my clients' dogs.
Sounds like a fun job! I love dogs.
I do too. I have 2 of my own.
How long have you had her?
I love dogs that I have had since they were puppies.
What kind of dogs do you have?
One is a golden retriever and the other is a beagle.
I know right? They're the best.
